title: Permission for erecting towers and antenna up to height permitted by the Civil Aviation Department shall be granted by the Authority as per the procedure followed for development permission or otherwise as may be decided by the Government
clause_text: Permission for erecting towers and antenna up to height permitted by the Civil Aviation Department shall be granted by the Authority as per the procedure followed for development permission or otherwise as may be decided by the Government.
section: (1) 7.8.1 For Municipal Corporations in Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Pune Metropolitan Region.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
